## USAGE

Copy this template when starting a new project or major feature. Fill in all fields. Link to SPINE-INDEX when complete.

---

PROJECT: [Name]
CODE: [XXX]
OWNER: [Who]
GITLAB: [URL to repo/issue]
STATUS: [DRAFT/REVIEW/APPROVED]
DATE: [YYYY-MM-DD]

## 1. PROBLEM

- Why does this need to exist?
- Who suffers without it?
- What's the cost of not doing it?

## 2. SOLUTION

- One sentence summary
- Explicit non-goals (what we WON'T do)

## 3. SUCCESS CRITERIA

- Measurable outcome 1
- Measurable outcome 2
- Measurable outcome 3

## 4. DEPENDENCIES

- Required: [What must exist first]
- Blocked by: [What's stopping us]
- Enables: [What this unlocks]

## 5. TIMELINE

- Target completion: [Date]
- Milestone 1: [Date] - [What]
- Milestone 2: [Date] - [What]

## 6. GITLAB LINK

[Link to tracking issue]
